Class AbstractAddRemoveStatementsOp

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BOp, IPropertySet, Serializable, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InsertStatementsOp, RemoveStatementsOp

    public abstract class AbstractAddRemoveStatementsOp
extends PipelineOp
    Abstract base class for operations which add or remove statements from the statement indices.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Method Detail

      • acceptSolutions

        protected static Set<ISPO> acceptSolutions(BOpContext<IBindingSet> context,
                                           boolean bindsC)
        Return the Set of distinct ISPOs extracted from the source solutions.
        Parameters:
        context - The query engine context.
        bindsC - true if the graph variable should be bound in the statements (SIDs or QUADs).
        Returns:
        The distinct ISPO.

      • getSPO

        protected static ISPO getSPO(IBindingSet bset,
                             boolean bindsC,
                             StatementEnum type)
        Return an ISPO constructed from the source solution.
        Parameters:
        bset - The source solution.
        bindsC - if the context position should be bound.
        type - The StatementEnum.
        Returns:
        The ISPO.

      • getIV

        protected static IV getIV(IVariable<?> var,
                          IBindingSet bset,
                          boolean required)
        Return the bound value for the variable.
        Parameters:
        v - The variable.
        bset - The source solution.
        required - true iff the variable must be bound.
        Returns:
        The bound value and null if the variable is not bound.
